Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: From my understanding, Generative AI is an untrustworthy source of information that must be compared with real data. From this, I use AI to improve a little bit majority of the information I use comes directly from my teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: There was no emotional difference from me when receiving feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: AI, unless given the marking rubic, doesn't know the important improvements I need to make. The teacher does.
